page.title: 16DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content: {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JENNIFER PARKE My name is Jennifer Parke. I am twelve years old and I live on Marsh Farm Estate. It is very untidy because there is litter everywhere.Most of the houses on Marsh Farm are owned by the council. I get up at 9.00 and watch cartoons untill 10.30. Then I get dressed and play tennis in my garden. At approximately 12.00 I go to town and do some shopping. When I get home again I watch television or read a book.Then I go and play tennis with a friend. At 5.30 I have my tea with my sister and dad. The rest of the night I watch television until about 10.30 then I go to bed.
